titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the United States Senate that President Obama should issue a statement regarding spying on His Holiness, Pope Francis.
A resolution expressing the sense of the United States Senate that President Obama should issue a statement regarding spying on His Holiness, Pope Francis.

action.text: Referred to the Select Committee on Intelligence.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of the Senate that President Obama should directly address the allegation that his administration monitored the calls of Pope Francis or the conclave selecting the Pope.
